channel.title: Help with script plz
channel.description: Whenever I run this script it runs, but it stops right away. don't worry about getting it to do stuff, as it starts the procedures when it finds a color on my computer that wont work for other computers. as long as it says "running script...." it's working, even if the mouse isn't moving. [scar] program New; var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,kounter,counter:integer; count:string; procedure counting; begin counter :=0 end; procedure healspells; begin kounter :=0 repeat//healing wait(1000) until(findcolor(a,b,9250560,400,700,405,706)) wait(1000) MoveMouse(751,620) wait(100) ClickMouse(751,620,true) repeat//waiting for battle wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) repeat//spelling wait(1000) MoveMouse(486,473) wait(100) ClickMouse(486,473,true) wait(2000) MoveMouse(628,601) wait(100) ClickMouse(628,601,true) repeat//waiting for spelling wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) kounter :=kounter+1 until(kounter=4) end; procedure death; begin MoveMouse(505,502) wait(100) ClickMouse(505,502,true) wait(5500) MoveMouse(407,440) wait(100) ClickMouse(407,440,true) wait(100) ClickMouse(407,440,true) wait(5000) MoveMouse(751,620) wait(100) ClickMouse(751,620,true) repeat//waiting for battle wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) end; procedure attack; begin repeat//attacking wait(2000) MoveMouse(495,424) wait(100) ClickMouse(495,424,true) If findcolor(e,f,461065,278,679,280,681) then Death; until(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314)) MoveMouse(502,547) wait(100) ClickMouse(502,547,true) repeat wait(1000) until(findcolor(i,j,2385472,432,260,437,265)) counter :=counter+1 count :=inttostr(counter) writeln(count+'monsters battled') end; procedure loop; begin repeat healspells; attack; loop; until(false) end; begin end. [/scar] thanks to anyone who could find the problem :)

item.title: Help with script plz
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Monkmonk693:

Ha, can’t believe i didnt see that…thanks a lot because i was looking in the wrong section of the script so i never would’ve found that! :rolleyes:

That’s why you need to format your code. That way it’s much easier.

Example…

Program New;

Var
  x, y : Integer;

Procedure WooWoo;
Begin
  x := 1;
  y := 1;
  WriteLn('Woo Woo!');
  WriteLn('Woo Woo!');
End;

Begin
  ClearDebug;
  WooWoo;
End.

See how clear it is? Easy to follow and easy to debug.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with script plz
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

you havent called the procedure “loop” in your main loop

[scar]begin
loop
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with script plz
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

Whenever I run this script it runs, but it stops right away. don’t worry about getting it to do stuff, as it starts the procedures when it finds a color on my computer that wont work for other computers. as long as it says “running script…” it’s working, even if the mouse isn’t moving.
[scar]
program New;
var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,kounter,counter:integer;
count:string;
procedure counting;
begin
counter :=0
end;
procedure healspells;
begin
kounter :=0
repeat//healing
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(a,b,9250560,400,700,405,706))
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
repeat//spelling
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(486,473)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(486,473,true)
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(628,601)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(628,601,true)
repeat//waiting for spelling
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
kounter :=kounter+1
until(kounter=4)
end;
procedure death;
begin
MoveMouse(505,502)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(505,502,true)
wait(5500)
MoveMouse(407,440)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(5000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
end;
procedure attack;
begin
repeat//attacking
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(495,424)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(495,424,true)
If findcolor(e,f,461065,278,679,280,681) then
Death;
until(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314))
MoveMouse(502,547)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(502,547,true)
repeat
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(i,j,2385472,432,260,437,265))
counter :=counter+1
count :=inttostr(counter)
writeln(count+‘monsters battled’)
end;
procedure loop;
begin
repeat
healspells;
attack;
loop;
until(false)
end;
begin
end.
[/scar]
thanks to anyone who could find the problem

Read full topic
